questions.subject: MATH
questions.stem: In the data set below, what is the lower quartile?

questions.subject: ENGLISH
questions.stem: Which figure of speech is used in this text?
questions.question: I've heard that Eva & Co. is downsizing, so I'm happy to see that their store in downtown Drummondville will remain open for now.
questions.answer: euphemism. A euphemism is a polite or indirect expression that is used to de-emphasize an unpleasant topic. e.g.The head of Human Resources would never refer to firing people, only to laying them off

questions.subject: ENGLISH
